long_description: Stay dry and warm on your next kayaking trip in the waterproof, breathable NRS Endurance paddling jacket. Waterproof, breathable fabric shields you from splashes while letting sweat vapor escape to keep you dry and comfortable. Adjustable neoprene neck and wrist closures create a comfortable seal, and factory-taped seams help keep water out. Shoulder accessory pocket with water-resistant zipper helps keep contents safe from moisture. Shockcorded waist cinches tight to seal out spray and prevent jacket from riding up.
short_description: Stay dry and warm on your next kayaking trip in the waterproof, breathable NRS Endurance paddling jacket.
